DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, single center, non-randomized study to evaluate the arrhythmia monitoring performance of the AVIVO™ System in a hospital setting.
DOC.brief_title: Monitoring Arrhythmia Patients in in Hospital Monitoring
DOC.detailed_description: The AVIVO™ System will continuously monitor the patient's cardiac activity which will be compared to the performance of standard telemetry system.
DOC.criteria: Is female or male, 18 years of age or older Undergoing inhospital electrocardiographic monitoring for primarily cardiac reasons Is participating in another clinical study that may confound the results of this study
